abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the project is to
            increase income and agricultural production of small farmers
            in central and northwest Maranhao by providing secure land
            tenure, technical, and marketing assistance, agricultural
            research, basic health care and expansion of education
            services, and project coordination, monitoring and
            evaluation. The project would reach some 39,000 small
            farmers in 46 municipalities of the state of Maranhao. A
            state land institute would be responsible for carrying out
            the regularization and redistribution of public lands to
            small farmers. Improved agricultural techniques would be
            introduced gradually to increase productivity while limiting
            soil erosion and improving soil fertility.
